content.description: Stand start at the big crack at the back of the boulder.  Use jugs, jams, or whatever to reach the top. ends on an easy mantle.
content.location: Big conspicuous crack at the back.

content.description: Moves up through super cool pockets and jugs, rather muscly moves. Stand start on a right hand crimp edge and a left hand pocket.
content.location: South side of the boulder, just around the arete from Fart Shoes and Dark Hole.

content.description: A super fun and easy route with a bit of a highball feel.  Stand start with R hand in the obvious hueco hole.  Climb juggy flakes to the top.
content.location: In the Road Boulder area, on the Sneaker Boulder, which is just North of Road Boulder.  See pics.

content.description: Sit start.  Climb the Northwest corner of the Sneaker boulder, past some crimps and horizontal seams.
content.location: In the Road Boulder area, on the Sneaker Boulder, which is just North of Road Boulder. See pics.

content.description: Stand start on the flakes on the left side of the front of the boulder, work your way up and to the right slightly to a big jug.
content.location: left corner side of the front, starts on the juggy flakes and goes right slightly.

content.description: A short, technical arete problem. Sit start on the arete. use arete pinches and good side-pulls to reach an easy mantle.
content.location: Leftmost on the back side of the boulder. It's the conspicuous arete with chalk on it.

content.description: Stand start on flake at the back of the boulder to the left of the big crack. Mid-problem mantle is probably the crux. keep climbing to an easy mantle
content.location: To the left of the big crack on the back side and to the right of Poop Man.

content.description: Short extension to Crack Attack, follows a patina flake and transitions into fun crack climbing. Rad little boulder problem. Squat Start on the flake about 5 feet to the right of Crack Attack. Climb up and campus left along the flake using mostly smears for your feet. Lock off your  right arm and reach for the crack. Side pull your way into a layback and continue laybacking up to an easy mantly
content.location: The flake just right of Crack attack.

content.description: Starts on a decent left hand pinch, a good crimp jug for the right, and a small rail for the feet on the far left. Deadpoint for the crack/rail pocket up and slightly to left, optional crimp up and to the right on the lip. Use the rail to head left to good jugs and climb up for the top-out.
content.location: Front side of the boulder. Middle right side.

content.description: Squat start on a left hand side pull pinch and a right hand big edge. Move upwards.
content.location: Right side of the front of the road boulder

content.description: Stand start on the crack and layback to the top. Ends on an easy mantle.
content.location: south side of the boulder, to the right of Stand Up.

content.description: Squat/stand Start on the big jugs in the middle of the front side of the boulder. Climb up and make a decent mantle for the top out.
content.location: Middle of the front side of the Road Boulder.
